lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: a small amount can mean a lot to people trying to improve their lives through their own initiative

lenders.name: Edna
lenders.loan_because: I have been compelled to help others become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: Investigate allegations for child abuse.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: even with a $9 an hour part time job and full time student, I CAN!  There are people out there with so much money they do not know what to do with it, and they do not loan.  I feel as a compassionate human being I need to help whoever, whenever, however I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a restaurant part-time and I am a full time student at Chico State University.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I have a small grasp on what it is like to be down and out.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean up dirty groundwater.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I have too much, and I don't appriciate it.  I would rather see others, those who might have a better use for the money than I do, use the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I study and I work very hard in order to fill my brain with knowledge... I go to school.

lenders.name: Rob & Mary
lenders.loan_because: We have enough to share and be thankful for.
lenders.occupational_info:
Rob is a news photographer.
Mary is a nurse.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: It's what people do in the world I want to live in

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I was given money

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.  My dollars do a lot more in some other countries than they can do here.

lenders.name: Carolina
lenders.loan_because: we all deserve a chance...

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: I hope it helps the borrowers be more successful  so they can continue to support there families.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell lenders what I think homes are worth.

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: To assist others in fulfilling dreams and making a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Mother, seeker, & recently completed graduate school.

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people in this world that need help and if I can make a change what a wonderful world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a caregiver with seniors and they bring joy to my life.They make me happy to be in this world.

lenders.name: Noel
lenders.loan_because: I care to make a difference

lenders.name: tina
lenders.loan_because: i hope to help some folks improve their lives.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe we're here on earth to help one another.  A lot of people have helped me during my life time in one way or another and I'm paying that kindness and generosity forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage 14-15 customer service representatives that answer tax related questions from taxpayer's all over the world.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I think that it is important to help others become sucessful and feel good about making a better life for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to invest their money.  By making their money grow they are able to have the freedom to accomplish their dreams and take care of their families.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: The rewards of lending far exceed the paltry rewards of bank interest on my money. I feel like I know the recipients of my loans and I feel so happy that I can help them achieve some financial independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from jobs in medical publishing. I "work" as a volunteer every day in church and community activities and trying to keep up with my grandchildren.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: the people who need these loans are hard working and devoted to bettering their lives,  if I can make a small difference that is my reward.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint watercolors, knit, felt and work a lot with my hands,  that is why I try to support the artistic endeavors of others when they come up on Kiva.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: "Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.” Mother Teresa
lenders.occupational_info: Entertainer

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because:
"You must be the change you want to see in the world." 
-- Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I provide training to researchers to help them be successful in their work while acting ethically. I specialize in working with researchers from low-resource environments.

lenders.name: Mirza Tashrif
lenders.loan_because: I am now going to set up a new business of Developing a Software Firm.
lenders.occupational_info:
Activities will be: 1. Software Development,
2. Website Development,
3. Hardware Maintenance & Trouble Shooting,
4. IT and Network Support,
5. Data Entry Job,
6. Designing and Illustration.

lenders.name: deena
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Maria Maciak
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make videos and work in a school.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Economically empowered women help their families and countries out of poverty.  Microlending is an investment in everyone's prosperity.

lenders.name: Nalita
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to become self-sufficient.

lenders.name: LaDawn
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving even if you can only give alittle can change a persons life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother first, raising my two children (6 years and 3 years).   As a physical therapist I help those who are sick heal.

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: Wu-Tang Clan is for the children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a problem solver, call me Revolver.

lenders.name: Cat
lenders.loan_because: I can. and because I was raised to believe that it is important to do what you can to help others. We are all here together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker. i work with persons who have hemophilia and other bleeding disorders. Previously, I worked with people with mental illness. I am fortunate to know and work for my clients.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because:
I have had a great deal of good fortune in my life. This is one of the ways I would like to give back and help others all over the world.

Paz y Amor

lenders.name: Serin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing person.

lenders.name: Chris THE stonehead
lenders.loan_because:
'The best thing about kiva is that you get your money back"                
                                 Chris Pan

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupation: The best child a parent can have
lenders.loan_because: My parents want me to have a good education. One of the things that I have to learn is the value of sharing.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because:
We al sould help poor people.
Because whe al live on the same world.

lenders.name: Pjotr
lenders.loan_because: It's a little amount that can make a difference for some one who wants to start something new. That's good to see!

lenders.name: Nimilote
lenders.loan_because: Need help in setting up a canteen extending our small scale farm and also in purchasing more calves for a milking station
lenders.occupational_info: Luckily we still have our own native land and that is what i am trying to utilize

lenders.name: Lars-Ake
lenders.loan_because: I think that we in the "western" world have such a good situation, so we can really afford to help other. And should do. It does not matter, really, if we get any money back. Not for me anyway.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I truly want to help make a difference in this world while I am here walking upon it.  As a business owner myself, who grew up with two parents that were small business owners, I understand how difficult it is to start, be successful, and grow that business - as the capital that's needed at times.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to find, buy, and dell their homes - whether they are 1st time homebuyers, people who are looking for the home of their dreams, or folks who might be looking to downsize to a smaller place.  "Home" has such deep meaning to me and all of teh things that it denotes - gatherings with family & friends, fond memories, quiet moments together.  So much of life revolves around "home" amd I'm proud and nonored to help people find a place that they can call "home".

lenders.name: stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: when God closes a door He opens a window.  Our job is to find the window.

lenders.name: Piotr
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do! Especially in places like Tajikistan where I have visited and I know the economy is very difficult and where a little bit could change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international aid organization and focus on the nutrition of children and women.

lenders.name: Arcadia
lenders.loan_because: I love the way KIva loans just continue to give and give.
lenders.occupational_info: I inspire people to make a difference in the world - to help ease the suffering of people living in extreme poverty.

lenders.name: Talal
lenders.loan_because: What I have is also a Loan from God.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it is the most effective way to help people improve their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Group Operational VP for the leading  North American manufacturer of Architectural metal and wood door opening solutions.

lenders.name: Beth Ann
lenders.loan_because: I care!  It is a privilege to give to others and this is a wonderful avenue for giving to those who have dreams!  I am so glad that Kiva exists!!  I am giving gift certificates as frequently as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently not working outside the home but feel that my current job is to be the support that my family and friends need and be available for whoever needs me whenever they need me!

lenders.name: Cemre
lenders.loan_because: i believe the way to help, is by giving them the opportunity to help them selves.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: The generosity and faith of others is what helped me achieve what I have today.
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate computer systems and determine what maintenance is needed, as well as developing new systems to increase productivity.

lenders.name: Colleen M.
lenders.loan_because: It's one world!

lenders.name: Bob and Cindy
lenders.loan_because: It is what we should do in this world.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: My Aunt Beth gave me $100.00 to use on Kiva to help me learn about other people and make them smile.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who loves to read and play with my dogs!

lenders.name: Amizadai
lenders.loan_because:
I lend because I can! 

I was very blessed to have the support of loved ones when I decided to start my own business. Making micro-loans is a small way of paying it foward!
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business providing wedding video services.

lenders.name: Coffee Ladies
lenders.loan_because: We have been getting together weekly for 25 years sharing our lives and supporting each other.  This is our way of sharing and supporting others.

lenders.name: DuncanMom
lenders.loan_because: Having my son see what true social justice is all about. That is faith - in action.
lenders.occupational_info: I support my colleagues in saving lives through organ and tissue donation. Register as am organ and tissue donor today!

lenders.name: Parents of Lucas Silvio
lenders.loan_because: In the long run, acts of justice (rather than simple charity), such as these loans, will change our world for the better.  We are so excited to have this option made easily accessible through kiva.org!

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be an American which means I have many luxuries like good food and good shelter and clean water.

lenders.name: Self
lenders.loan_because: i like to help people...

lenders.name: Jørn & Yingyin
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people, and it's fun!

lenders.name: Miles
lenders.loan_because: No particular reason, just enjoy helping people being successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team that provides customer service support to the largest telecommunication company in the world.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't I want to help others help themselves?  This is the perfect thing...
lenders.occupational_info: I help large companies use technology to do things better.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: We are all one big community

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Full time faculty.

lenders.name: Kym
lenders.loan_because: I believe this to a superb way of getting young people involved in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: University Professor, Art and Design, Activism

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: My Mom was a widow who raised 9 children by herself to all receive higher education and to do the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I study problems in business causing waste and inefficiency to develop solutions for higher productivity, profits and employee satisfaction with their enviroment.

lenders.name: Eilish
lenders.loan_because: In memory of my lovely Mom and Dad.

lenders.name: P. C.
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in individuals who want to make something of themselves and their businesses who are proud and thankful for their success for themselves, their famiy and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: My work supplies high security products to Fire Department and Emergency Medical personal so they can help others.

lenders.name: cory & amy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Yves
lenders.loan_because: the money goes to people who can make better use of it than me!

lenders.name: Heidi
Eric
lenders.loan_because: I follow Jesus and he said to seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness/justice...

lenders.name: Fritz Family
lenders.loan_because: We like to help emerging entrepreneurs!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I hope it helps.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: Although I am not rich we have so much in America.  I would like to share with those who are trying to make their lives better by hard work and making a business.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: William Penn once said, "If there is any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow human being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again."  Thank you  Kiva for providing us with this opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: www.latinbiz.net

lenders.name: John and Tracy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I build homes and commercial buildings

lenders.name: Michael and Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We love the fact that small loans can affect someone so much.  In a world where the politicians often fail us the answer is to solve the problems ourselves.  KIVA allows us to feel we are doing the tiniest part of doing that.

lenders.name: Geoff Barnard
lenders.loan_because: I've been in the Peace Corps as well as worked all my career in the non-profit sector.  Kiva seems like a brilliant way to connect people together to help improve lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I wrapped up a career as a non-profit executive in 2005 after 33 years with The Nature Conservancy, the Grand Canyon Trust, and The Arboretum at Flagstaff.  I now use my experience, especially in fundraising and marketing, as a non-profit consultant to help other organizations be as good as they can be.

lenders.name: sebastien
lenders.loan_because: I love backing entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: investing in companies / backing entrepreneurs with good business ideas

lenders.name: Evelyn C.
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower the lives of people around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital setting with patients whom just had surgery

lenders.name: Kim Gibson
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help people who are in, somewhat better need of money than I am, when it comes to get a good and perhaps, better life for them selves! We in the "western" world are so spoiled and take most of our "good life" for granted...  We should ALL try and give some more; of everything ... to those who are less fortunate!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work as a veterinary technician in an Animal Hospital - the equivalence of a registered nurse in humane medicine. My tasks are to assist the veterinarian with everything; give shots, draw blood samples and run them, put the animals on IV meds, take x-rays, sell cat and dog food in our store and lots more! I LOVE it!!

The cat in the photo is my own, her name is Mimys  :-)

lenders.name: Mary Lee
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to add my light to the "sum of lights" working to illuminate the world. I enjoy that I get to have a small connection with people across the world who are working hard. I appreciate the KIVA organization making this possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of materials engineers who are part of teams that design, build and maintain the engines that power airplanes, helicopters and ships. I have a great husband and two beautiful daughters, and I am very lucky!

lenders.name: Hardison Sims Family
lenders.loan_because: If we work together we can make our world a happier, healthier and more peaceful place to live and work.
lenders.occupational_info:
(Jen) I work with teachers and students to learn more about the International Baccalaureate Programme. I help students find worthwhile service projects and help teachers write curriculum that will hopefully change the world for the better.
(Dusty) Started a Home Inspection Co in San Diego building off his 20+ years experience in custom electronics, integrated fire/code/alarm systems and construction.

lenders.name: Language Resources
lenders.loan_because: Language Resources is made up of translator and interpreter entrepreneurs from around the world. Lending a hand like this seems a positive way to join together.  Plus, our "Kiva Pot-lucks" are FUN!
lenders.occupational_info: Language Resources provides translations in over 55 languages and we send out interpreters across the state of North Carolina.  We also teach English as a Second Language.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and want to share my good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Internet technology.

lenders.name: janie
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed and want to pay it forward....do the right thing..make a difference....evenif it is a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught English as a second language for many years, then native american studies, now I am semi retired have 2 horses 2alpacas, 1llama, 3 dogs, and 3 cats and 1 terrific husband. I work promoting good nutriion, and awareness of asthma, diabetes and obesity...

lenders.name: angie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others

lenders.name: jim
lenders.occupational_info: I was a fire investigator and SOCO (CSI without the hummer and the mood lighting) in the Irish police force and now I am soco again, recently in Milton Keynes and now in St. Helier in the UK.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell and service lawn care equipment.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I have had to work hard for everything  in my life. I understand well , how much even a small amount of support can mean.
lenders.occupational_info: Contract the installation and repair of heating and cooling equipment.

lenders.name: Ginny
lenders.occupation: Retired health care worker. A citizen activist

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: I pay it forward.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: i believe in paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: executive do-gooder.

lenders.name: Fran
lenders.loan_because: I support people's hard work, ingenuity, and their dreams to improve their lives and those of their children.  Handouts are not the answer... supporting people in their own dreams is!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a  counsellor in private practice working mainly with couples and families.  I grew up on the farm and know the value of hard work, still love gardening!

lenders.name: Brandeis Posse 8
lenders.loan_because: We are a group that is dedicated to staying together and helping each other through the best and the hardest times of our lives.  As a group we understand how one person can help change the life another in extraordinary ways.
lenders.occupational_info: Our group is made up of 10 college students, our mentor who works with us on campus, and his wife.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it! I've been self-employed so I know how hard it is to make it as an entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell used books.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: At least in some small way I can help someone else achieve  something that might only be a dream otherwise.

lenders.name: Manuel
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me to come  out of poverty as a youth  to provide me with prosperity and responsibility as an adult. Along the way many have blessed me in my life to get here and I would like pass along  blessings to others as  have been  provided me.
lenders.occupational_info: I negotiate financial agreements between my company and other companies and foster mutually beneficial relationships.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It's a great program and a way to help people directly.

lenders.name: Gillian and Gary Katz
lenders.occupational_info: Helping children...one at a time!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: My family decided to make loans rather than giving each other Christmas gifts this year.

lenders.name: Michael & Darcy
lenders.loan_because: To help in ways that really are needed, not just what we might imagine.
lenders.occupational_info: Michael is an English teacher at public schools and Darcy is a family practice physician.

lenders.name: Scott & MaryAnn
lenders.loan_because: A wave a ripple makes!
lenders.occupational_info: Retailer of licensed NFL and New York Yankees gifts and clothing.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: As a high school senior studying global cultures, I have often thought about how I could use the resources I have to help those in need throughout the world. Through Kiva I can help people improve their own economic situations with long term results. I am hoping that by actively participating in the loan process, I can directly help some people, report my experience to classmates, members of my school district and my community and raise their awareness of this program. Hopefully I can help others realize that a small loan from them can make a world of difference in the fight against poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my final year of high school. I work part-time doing lawn care, yard work, carpentry and house painting. Next year I plan to attend college and study engineering.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometime.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Technical.

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: Every human being deserves to have meaningful work to do that allows them to feel a sense of purpose, to earn a basic standard of living and to be able to acquire not only the things that they need to survive but perhaps even a few special items that bring them joy. I believe people are meant to be living more in community in this world and any monetary wealth of my own is only worth what it can bring to individuals and communities in terms of enriching lives and the human experience for all people- regardless of place or situation.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Great opportunity to support people who know the value of money and work.
lenders.occupational_info: Help others to define problems and solve them

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: it changes lives.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who don't have as many chances as I do.
lenders.occupational_info: Inventors send their inventions to the Patent Office in Washington DC.  The examiners look at the inventions very carefully.  When it looks like the invention works and no-one else has done it before, then we give the inventor a Patent for his invention.  That means that he is the only person who can sell his invention.

lenders.name: windyCityScope
lenders.loan_because: If Kiva didn't exist, I intended to launch one myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Capital Markets

lenders.name: Megan and Thomas
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing way to give someone the assistance they need while they are able to retain their dignity. I think Kiva is wonderful!
lenders.occupational_info: I will just say that I am grateful to be employed.

lenders.name: Seana
lenders.loan_because: ... I can. Everyone deserves the chance to make their lives better. It was pure luck that I was born in a rich country where $25 doesn’t seem that much to me, but it could mean the world to someone else.  Share the abundance when you have it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Warthogg
lenders.loan_because: I'm a firm believer that co-development and microcredit are pragmatic and efficient solutions to reduce poverty.

lenders.name: Aziz
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to pursue their dream of achieving financial independence
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses to meet their IT needs

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because:
I want to feel connected to the developing world.  I look forward to seeing these small business thrive and creating economic independence.

~This is not charity. This is business: business with a social objective, which is to help people get out of poverty.~ 
-Muhammad Yunus, author of "Banker to the Poor"
lenders.occupational_info: I work within the business development and planning team in a hospital.  I help develop strategic growth plans for the hospital's services, such as within oncology,  and do competitor research.

lenders.name: Lane
lenders.loan_because: By American standards, I am not a wealthy person.  By world standards, I have plenty of money.  To me the idea of microfinance is so incredibly beautiful and practical at the same time.  I find it absolutely inspirational that an ordinary person like me can perhaps make an extraordinary difference in the quality of someone's life by loaning them a little money for a little while.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of other people's money by paying their bills and billing their customers.  And I assist in borrowing money to help them grow their business.  So, I know the great benefit of being able to borrow money, and I know how successful and proud one feels when that borrowed money is paid back.

lenders.name: Amy & Doug
lenders.loan_because: I am impressed with the drive and determination in the stories I have read. I can't wait to loan again soon
lenders.occupational_info: Staying home with my daughter is such a blessing.  I do work part-time as a baker, making cookies, pies etc. for a local bakery.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: I am eager to help women help hemselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My life's work has been encouraging and enabling women to rise to their highest potential in an academic setting.  It is astonishing and most gratifying to see what happens when one sets expectations high and provides tools and encouragement.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I learn, teach, study, and write. I also make websites sometimes.

lenders.name: ellen
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach first grade in Bethesda Maryland.

lenders.name: LaVonne
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to help others help themselves

lenders.name: Ian Lawlor
lenders.loan_because: My nephew and partner introduced me to this www page with a Christmas gift 2007 and I want to pass on these good wishes to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Consultant archaeologist working with Maori Iwi (tribes) and Tangatawhenua promoting partnerships with NZ government agencies and stakeholders.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: There are children and families who go to bed hungry and don't have the opportunities or blessings that we have in the U.S.A. which so many people here take for granted.
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi-retired now, and volunteer my time at the local VFW, Viet Nam Veterans, as well as several environmental organizations

lenders.name: Marijke
lenders.loan_because: I am so very lucky and blessed in my life. When I started my business I had people that believed in me and gave me a chance. I believe we can make this a better world by helping one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a preschool for children ages 6 weeks to 5 years old.

lenders.name: Brenna
lenders.loan_because: It's giving someone the chance and opportunity to help themselves, which I believe is the best kind of help you can give.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.occupation: Exec. Director of environmental education non-prof

lenders.name: Rex and Irene Lawlor
lenders.loan_because: Our nephew and partner gave us a Christmas (2007) gift and we want to keep on giving this good cheer.
lenders.occupational_info: Home gardening and craft work.

lenders.name: Marci
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to reach their full potential.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: Reaching out to someone and giving them a helping hand to help themselves and their families is something that brings this world closer together.  Sometimes all you need is someone to believe in you and a little support--and you can change your life!
lenders.occupational_info: Own a management company with my husband-we manage apartments and small retail centers as well as developing other real estate projects

lenders.name: Joe & Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
I know what it's like to need start up capital. 
I want to help people that have the drive to make a better life for them self's. 
I also want to give some thing back.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm self employed
Domino's Pizza Franchisee...

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Lending through Kiva seems like a direct way to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who helps those who are accused of a crime, and who cannot afford to pay for a lawyer.

lenders.name: Cub Scout Pack 171
lenders.loan_because: To get our Cub Scout pack involved in helping others at an early age.

lenders.name: A_I
lenders.loan_because: a little goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a post-grad student studying International Project Management. I hope to one day work in the field of International Development.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity and gifts that have been given to me in my life and want to give back to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I put people off to sleep for surgery.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay-at-home mother of 1 very active 2 year old. In addition, I work from home part-time doing Independent Contracting.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Jamaica for two years and I saw how a a small amount of money can make big changes in the lives of people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Create a variety of multimedia marketing campaigns and thought leadership programs for the private and public sectors.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: somebody should.
lenders.occupational_info: Telling the story of Sanergy in the urban slums of Nairobi.

lenders.name: Cathe
lenders.loan_because: As Dr. Muhammad Yunus, a Nobel Prize winner, notes "being poor should not be a barrier to being able to take out a loan to buy your way out of poverty."  This is the ultimate in paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with homeless single mothers who are changing their lives and the lives of their children by earning college degrees to provide them with career-track employment.  We empower families through education.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: my friends and I decided to give to others instead of exchanging Christmas presents...
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students who have disabilities.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I think free money is great!

lenders.name: jen
lenders.loan_because: i believe in people's courage.
lenders.occupational_info: mommy

lenders.name: Joseph Mastey
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes you get help, sometimes you give it.

lenders.name: Marla
lenders.loan_because: I like joining with many others to help industrious people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
Now I work on clay creations which can be seen at:
goodearthclaydesigns.shutterfly.com

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: "...not for yourself, but for the whole world were you born"

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.occupation: Elected County Official and Early Learning Spclist
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help in a permanent and sustaining way! And it breaks up a busy local day with an international impact!
lenders.occupational_info: I represent local residents in issues, esp how tax dollars are spent. In my other job I help infants and children under age 3 who have disabilities. Teach parents how to help the children, do therapy, learn new skills.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because:
I saw the "Water Buffalo" short film and it touched my heart.
http://www.jazzviolin.com/china/water-buffalo-movie/
I wanted to do something to help the world in my own small way and was directed to this website.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Alicyn
lenders.loan_because: I care about other people.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: a great person introduced me to this site...and I want to help with whatever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who struggle in  school to help them succeed.

lenders.name: Maximiliano
lenders.loan_because: it helps other people improve their lives

lenders.name: JD Smith
lenders.loan_because: I didn't get started by myself either. What goes around comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to know I can have a part in helping people all over the world achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with autism

lenders.name: Mich
lenders.loan_because: I want to; I'm able to; I should.

lenders.name: Area Family
lenders.loan_because: waarom?  daarom.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: It is important for me to help women across the globe.  I also want to encourage my children and family members to support others around the globe as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychologist focusing on Leadership Development, Coaching Women in the Workplace, Work/Life Balance and Team Building.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this program from my dad who read about it in the newspaper.  It sounded like such a great idea and a way to help someone through supporting their business.  I am really excited to be a new member!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an occupational therapist  in a senior center and to home visits for an elderly low-income population.  Our members qualify for nursing home level of care and can remain safely in the community with the help of my organization.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to have success and want to help others achieve their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an office where the associates help people recover from auto accidents through finance

lenders.name: Vintage Fashion Library
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people with their sewing skills.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell sewing patterns in two stores online.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I want to change my world by giving others the tools to change their world!
lenders.occupational_info: I take raw undeveloped land and prepare it for housing development.

lenders.name: Mathew
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for a small advertising and marketing firm in Minneapolis, Minnesota.  While at work I write computer code for various websites that works behind the scenes.

Essentially, I help to make the internet work the way it does.  Click and you go?  I work on the 'you go' part!

lenders.name: Ritchie
lenders.loan_because: I have many blessings in my life  most of which can be traced back to the support of a loving family and good friends.  It is easy to succeed when you can count on help when it is needed.  I hope that I am able to help someone in some small way as a way to say thanks for all the help that I have received along the way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am happily Married with two children youngest is in grade 12.  I am an aircraft mechanic, an occupation that has kept me employed for the last 23 years.  It is a job that I find both challenging and interesting.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because:
People take chances on me every day!

25$ is round of drinks for my friends and I on any given night but a means to a wonderful end for some amazing people!

lenders.name: Michael & Julie
lenders.loan_because: "Faith is being sure of what we hope for and certain of what we do not see." Hebrews 11:1. We're so thankful for God's promises, provisions and care. We want to share His love with others. ~ Each day growing by faith to love & serve!

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Agnieszka
lenders.loan_because: I care & I can

lenders.name: Paul & Jill
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help. We're all in this together. Loans made in memory of Charles Kellner
lenders.occupational_info: I work in music - media - on both the creative and finance side. My wife works in HR

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I have had the privilege to visit developing countries such as Ghana and Togo, and I want to help the people there.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in the time of need is something that comes naturally to me.  And showing my daughter that helping others is very important in life. Alicyn is my lovely, beautiful daugther!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping surgeons and patients in the operating room during surgical cases.

lenders.name: Jacques
lenders.loan_because:
I was always taught to "leave it better than you found it".  It in this case is the world.  I am not rich in money, but I have enough to cover my essentials.  Now it is time to help others to the extent that I can.

I am especially interested in loans going to Haiti because i have visited there 3 times and understand first hand the depth of need in that country.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others find houses to live in or buildings to turn into businesses.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: everyone at least deserves an opportunity.

lenders.name: Tamar
lenders.loan_because: I believe the world would be a better place if we all help each other make it a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide general medical care to low income teenagers.  In addition, I run a reproductive health clinic in the schools;  providing family planning education, starting girls on birth control methods, and testing and treating teens  for sexually transmitted diseases.

lenders.name: The Women's House
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students living together in the Women's House at Ohio Wesleyan University.

lenders.name: EdV
lenders.loan_because: I understand what a big difference a little thing can make.
lenders.occupational_info:
Making electrical power generation systems from 100 Watts to 2 Mega Watts reliable and affordable to a wide range of customers.  

I also teach music.

lenders.name: Sample Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family has been very blessed and we would love to pass on our blessing to others.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: My grand father was a great doctor who always treated his patients regardless of their financial ability.  It is the rigt action for me to share the gift he left us to people in need.

lenders.name: JMO
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to give back. I've been blessed with a good job and it's only fair that someone else get the same chance as me.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk on the radio and send technicians to homes to fix plumbing and air-conditioning and heating problems.

lenders.name: John and Paula
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Naval aviator. My Wife is a retired school teacher.

lenders.name: TLC family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an Administrator, My fiance is a 7th grade teacher

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the poor
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very interesting,I get to meet people from all over the world and hear about their different cultures and lifestyles.

lenders.name: Bernadette
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women break the cycle of poverty.

lenders.name: Isa & Twyla
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have others help me with my business and I know what a an fantastic difference that makes!
lenders.occupational_info:
I own a hair salon where we cut, color and style hair. We like to help people feel good about themselves.
I also manufacture hair color products.
